column2: 12.  When  the  matter  was  taken  up  for  argument,  the  Learned  President’s

yardstick  in  analysing  the  prosecution’s  case  as  against  the
iii.  Did  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  err  in  coming  to  the

iv. Did  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  err  in  rejecting  the  dock
